title: EU Parliament Approves Landmark AI Legislation
description: In a significant milestone for the global technology landscape, the European Union Parliament has passed the EU AI Act after three years of extensive negotiations. title: Crypto investment products see inflows of $862m
description: The inflow into cryptocurrency investment products from March 23 to 29 amounted to $862 million after an outflow of $942 million a week earlier.

title: Analyst Benjamin Cowen Warns Ethereum Still in Danger of Witnessing 2019-Style Collapse – Here’s Why
